document_data.name: Eomane
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Eomanes''' of [[Baldur's Gate]] were one of the rich [[patriar]] families that composed the city's wealthy noble-class. They earned their riches from the first-class perfumery they owned, along with manufactories that produced oil from fish and [[whale]]s.

Their estate, the [[Eomane House]], was located in the [[Manorborn]] district of the [[Upper City]].

Notable Members.15{{th}} Century:
* [[Nysene Eomane]], the entitled noblewoman often invited Baldurian status-seekers to the family estate for revels and cruelly tortured them, without causing any severe physical harm.
* [[Sarken Eomane]], a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
